{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WR843N |revision=v2.x |series=N300 |asin= |fcc_date=11/17/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TE7WR843NV2 |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=0.85 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=ns |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9533;QCA9533-BL3A; |cpu1_cspeed=650 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S25FL032P |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Zentel |ram1_model=A3S56D40GTP-50L |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9533;QCA9533-BL3A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=passive PoE |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|300Mbps Wireless N Router}} :[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/?model=TL-WR843N Product page]
"2050500583" and "1521" is silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/TE7WR843NV2/Internal-Photos/Internal-Photos-2812956 FCC photos].
*[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=68090 ''Support for TP-Link TL-WR843N v2'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] {{see also|TP-LINK TL-WR843ND}} *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wr843nd ''TP-Link TL-WR843ND'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki]
